description: This award-winning family-run truck provides a tasty variety of gourmet sliders, that fit right in your hand, and are sure to satisfy any kind of hankering.Their selection includes the Backyard (slow-smoked brisket, fried mac-n-cheese, chef’s potato salad, house pickles, and homemade BBQ sauce), Green Piece (hand-battered fried green tomatoes, Chef’s pickled onions, lettuce, avocado sauce, and over easy egg), Early Burg (juicy hand-patted burger dusted with fresh ground coffee, over easy egg, and homemade bacon jelly). For all this and much more, be sure to slide on by to Hand Helds and give these delightfully delicious sandwiches a try.
name: Hand Helds
